mapper.select: select sum(case when t.CLASSID='71'and t.ATTEN_STATUS='出勤' then 1 else 0 end)*1.0/count(t.CLASSID='71' OR NULL) as num71, sum(case when t.CLASSID='72'and t.ATTEN_STATUS='出勤' then 1 else 0 end)*1.0/count(t.CLASSID='72' OR NULL) as num72, sum(case when t.CLASSID='81'and t.ATTEN_STATUS='出勤' then 1 else 0 end)*1.0/count(t.CLASSID='81' OR NULL) as num81, sum(case when t.CLASSID='82'and t.ATTEN_STATUS='出勤' then 1 else 0 end)*1.0/count(t.CLASSID='82' OR NULL) as num82, sum(case when t.CLASSID='91'and t.ATTEN_STATUS='出勤' then 1 else 0 end)*1.0/count(t.CLASSID='91' OR NULL) as num91 from (select b.CLASSID,a.ATTEN_STATUS from stuattendance a ,ma_user b where a.USER_ID=b.USER_ID) t
